desc: Waterdale Collection: Designers of Acrylic / Lucite Al Hamichya, Lucite Asher Yatzar, Lucite Wig Head & Lucite Benchers, Leather Challah Covers, Lucite Shtenders, Lucite Hadlokat Neirot, Lucite Challah Boards & more Lucite Judaica Art & Modern Artwork. A Magnificent Collection of Modern Judaica Tableware for Shabbos.
